hymn.title: All Things Came into Being through Him

layout.singingstanza: All things, all things Came in -- to be -- ing, came in -- to be -- ing; All things, all things Came in -- to be -- ing thru Him.
layout.sheetcopyright: www.hymnal.net; © 2013 Bible StorySongs, Inc. Used by permission.

lyrics.stanza: All things, all things Came into being, came into being; All things, all things Came into being thru Him.
Green frogs, pink hogs Came into being, came into being; Big blue whales, slimy snails Came into being thru Him.
Skies of blue, morning dew Came into being, came into being; Streams that flow, falling snow Came into being thru Him.
